content: Is the std4 test suite set up so I can test that certain things do not work? In particular, I want to test that an error: unsolved goals really happens.
I want to update all the tests to use #guard_msgs at some point, that way they can all run quietly and check the output
Ah, great, that not only captures messages but actually hides the error. Works great (after setting set_option linter.unreachableTactic false, else I get new lint errors when I use #guard_msgs)
Joachim Breitner has marked this topic as resolved.
